subject: PROPORSAL!!!
body:
My name is gustavo sarmiento, I am a British citizen.i have a little 
proposition for you .I took time to study the situation of things and also I 
wish to inform you that I have gone through your profile through your 
country's chamber of commerce directory,this actually
motivated me to  contact you ,I will like to invest in your country as a 
builder (real estate) and i am willing to accept any reasonable and 
favorable condition given to me .I also want to acquire and invest on 
properties e.g Houses,Hotels,and landed properties if you can assure me that 
its favourable.
Please Sir , if you are willing and interested to transact with me,kindly 
contact me swiftly
Thanks for your cooperation.
Your Sincerely,
Gustavo Sarmiento
